com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.message

Interface Mention

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mention.All, Mention.MentionAll, Mention.MentionPerson, Mention.Person

    public interface Mention
    A data type represents mention.

    Mention is the way to send specific notification to the people mentioned.

    Since:
    1.4.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Mention.All
      Mention all people in a space.
      static class  Mention.MentionAll
      Deprecated.  
      static class  Mention.MentionPerson
      Deprecated.  
      static class  Mention.Person
      Mention one particular person by person Id.
